short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making responsive design a little bit easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whether your a developer or a designer you most likely have heard of responsive design. This little extension helps you out by opening the current page you are visiting in new window 320px wide.
